Package com.bandyer.android_common.fetcher

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OnUserImageFetcherObserver
    Interface that must be called on users mapped from users aliases.
    OnUserInformationFetcherObserver
    Interface that must be called on user mapped from user aliases.
    UserDisplayInfoFormatter
    UserDisplayInfoFormatter interface is used to customize how a user is displayed with a UserDisplayInfo object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    UserDisplayInfo
    This class represents some user display info. A user can be represented with the following info:
    UserDisplayInfoFormatterImpl
    UserDisplayInfoFormatter default Implementation
    UserImageBitmapDisplayInfo
    User Image Display Info by bitmap
    UserImageDisplayInfo
    This class represents some user visual display info. A user image display info can be created with a bitmap or valid url to retrieve image or a valid resId.
    UserImageResIdDisplayInfo
    User Image Display Info by resId
    UserImageUrlDisplayInfo
    User Image Display Info by url
    UserInformationFetcher
    Utility class to be user to map user alias with a class representation of a user. Load your user synchronously or asynchronously and return result on the OnUserFetcherObserver provided interface as an HashMap of alias mapped with BaseUser class.
